output to "/home/mfg/comp/fa_disp_rsn.txt".
for each fa_mstr where fa_disp_dt <> ? break by fa_disp_rsn by fa_id:

put fa_disp_rsn "" fa_disp_dt "" fa_id skip . 

if fa_disp_rsn = "工艺布局" then fa_disp_rsn = "BF001".
if fa_disp_rsn = "工艺改造" then fa_disp_rsn = "BF001".
if fa_disp_rsn = "工艺淘汰" then fa_disp_rsn = "BF002".
if fa_disp_rsn = "坏无法修" then fa_disp_rsn = "BF005".
if fa_disp_rsn = "热锻拆除" then fa_disp_rsn = "BF003".
if fa_disp_rsn = "生产线淘" then fa_disp_rsn = "BF002".
if fa_disp_rsn = "闲置不用" then fa_disp_rsn = "BF004".

end.
output close .


/*报废原因清单*************************
BF001	工艺布局改造,路线调整
BF002	生产线改造淘汰设备
BF003	工厂拆除设备报废
BF004	闲置不用
BF005	设备已坏,无法修复
**************************************/
